item.title: These airlines were the most on-time in 2024
item.description: Supply chain issues and strong travel demand continued in 2024.

item.title: At least 10 killed in New Orleans truck attack, driver identified as U.S. citizen with ISIS flag
item.description: "This man was trying to run over as many people as he could," Police Chief Anne Kirkpatrick said at a televised press conference on Wednesday.

item.title: Sugar Bowl postponed one day following deadly New Orleans attack
item.description: The Sugar Bowl will be postponed until Thursday in the wake of the attack on Bourbon Street in New Orleans, where the college football game will take ...

item.title: The battered bond market starts 2025 facing some difficult issues about debt
item.description: Investors face multiple challenges in the year ahead, including one under-the-radar worry about short term notes coming due.

item.title: These restaurant chains closed locations in 2024
item.description: Wendy's, Applebee's and Red Lobster were among the chains that announced restaurant closures in 2024.
